author: Dorothy Rabinowitz
title: ‘Trump’s Takeover’ Review: Conflicts and Chaos
text: Via a documentary unfailing in its drama, not to mention its unforgettable detail, “Trump’s Takeover” follows Donald Trump’s path to ultimate control of the Republican Party. This “Frontline” film traces the way in which most of that party, including its establishment wing, came to see no alternative but to fall in with the president—a story filled with conflicts whose bitterness would show its effects even in the unlikeliest of personalities. Even, that is, on the silken Sen. Mitch McConnell. Just after the doomed effort to repeal Obamacare, an enraged President Trump delivered a steady stream of tweets attacking Congress,...
